title: How to Find Deleted Apps on an iPhone

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . It’s a blue app icon with a white "A" inside, usually found on your home screen. [1] X Expert Source Gonzalo Martinez Computer & Phone Repair Specialist Expert Interview. 4 May 2021.

steps.title: Tap the sign-in button or your photo at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Tap the sign-in button or your photo at the top of the screen. It's to the left of the "Today" header and will take you to your profile.

steps.title: Tap Purchased.
steps.content: Tap Purchased . You'll see this under your profile icon and above "Subscriptions." If you use Family Sharing, tap "My Purchases" or the family member with the purchased app that you want to download. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Not on this iPhone tab.
steps.content: Tap the Not on this iPhone tab. It’s on the right-hand side of the screen, opposite of All . It will bring up a list of apps you've purchased, but that aren't currently on your iPhone.

steps.title: Tap the cloud icon next to the app you want to restore.
steps.content: Tap the cloud icon next to the app you want to restore. This will download the deleted app back onto your iPhone. [3] X Expert Source Gonzalo Martinez Computer & Phone Repair Specialist Expert Interview. 4 May 2021. If you don’t see the deleted app you’re looking for in the list, you can also search for it in the Search field at the top of the page, just above the list of apps. [4] X Research source
